objective: I'm looking forward to working on new and challenging Swift projects.

workExperience.title: Senior iOS Developer
workExperience.details: At Eternal I've worked on several iOS projects such as an app for a health insurance company, an app for a public university, and apps for several municipalities in Czechia. I've also developed several internal libraries such as a HTML parser and renderer using native UIKit views, a Realm database synchronization tool, or a MVVM project template using state-of-the-art design patterns (such as DI/Swinject, Coordinators/Routers, Services, RxSwift/Cocoa, Quick/Nimble / VC/VM testing / service mocking / leak testing).

technologies.title: Programming Languages
technologies.description:
Main: Swift, Objective-C (since Swift launched mostly supporting legacy code)
Experienced: Java, C#, Javascript/NodeJS, Python, Kotlin
Essential: Bash
